app.title: Pelilauta
app.footnote: A Community SPA. All text content (c) by the author(s).
app.updatesAvailable: A new version is available, please refresh

welcome.title: Welcome to Pelilauta
welcome.message: A Role playing games community App. You can login with email, google, or facebook to access full functionality of the site.

errorPage.message: It seems that the route you used to reach this site is broken. You might find what you were looking for with search, or from the front page?

login.title: Login or Register
login.emailLoginMessage: You can register, and login by using a link sent to you with email. Please note we use Google Firebase Authentication, and do store your account details in Google Public Cloud (EU sites, where possible)
login.message: Alternatively, you can use single sign on with the services below

profile.publicInfoHelper: Your public profile data, visible to anyone browsing the site.
profile.ssoInfocardHelper: Your personal profile data, visible to you and administration of the site.
profile.title: Profile

thread.deleteFail: Uh, oh. It seems we are not able to delete the thread right now.
thread.deleteWarning: Deleting a thread will erase the discussion and any data related to the thread permanently. Please type DELETE to the field below to verfy you really want to do this.

snacks.invalidEmail: Error handling email, please try again.

players.title: Players
players.editingRightsWarning: Please note: all players have full editing access to the site pages.
players.removed: Player succesfully removed from the game.

wiki.title: Mekanismi
wiki.createSiteTitle: Create a new Game or Site
wiki.errorSiteSlug: The URL slug is taken already!

page.name: Title
page.deleteWarning: Deleting a page will erase the page and any data related to the page permanently. Please type DELETE to the field below to verfy you want to do this.

welcome.paragraph: The Elven Wizard casts a level 20 resurrection. Please login to continue.

site.name: Site Name
site.owners: Site Owners (full control of the site)
